synopsis.text: Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi Sugimoto, known as "Sugimoto the Immortal," is on a mission to find a hidden treasure in the unforgiving wilderness of Hokkaido. After hearing tales of a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, Sugimoto discovers a coded map leading to the treasure, which is tattooed on the bodies of convicts in Abashiri Prison. But he's not the only one after the gold, as ruthless criminals and rogue soldiers are also in pursuit. Teaming up with Asirpa, an Ainu girl with exceptional hunting skills, Sugimoto must navigate harsh conditions, dangerous enemies, and deadly animals in order to find the treasure and fulfill a promise he made to his fallen comrade's widow. With Asirpa seeking to reclaim what was rightfully her people's, the pair embarks on a treacherous journey to uncover the hidden stash of gold.
